medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe epigastric abdominal pain radiating to the back.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient began experiencing abdominal pain after eating pasta, which was severe and not improving, prompting her to visit the emergency room.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Choledocholithiasis with episode of biliary colic, asthma, migraines.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of hepatobiliary disease.
